Cedric,

Are you sure this is all Mark meant?

I thought he was asserting =
a functional advantage ... not merely 
contrasting the stylistic nuances of=
 the two API approaches 
(inheritance vs. declarative).

(You wouldn't want=
 a large organization to incur the expense of 
retooling their localhost in=
-container test environment just for a 
matter of style.  Right?)

_Marvin =
 (OOP bigot :-)
